languages.text: Все присутствующие затаили дыхание — с волнением мы ожидали слов Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: Все присутствующие затаили дыхание — с волнением мы ожидали слов Лорд-капитана.

languages.text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.
languages.original_text: Все присутствующие затаили дыхание — с волнением мы ожидали слов Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: Everyone there held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.
Everyone there held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.
All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.
All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.
All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

languages.text: 全員が息を止め、この光景に動揺しながら、私たちはロード・キャプテンが話すのを待った。
languages.original_text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

traits.locale_text: 全員が息を止め、この光景に動揺しながら、私たちはロード・キャプテンが話すのを待った。

languages.text: Tout le monde retenait son souffle. Perturbés par ce spectacle, nous attendions que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prenne la parole.
languages.original_text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

traits.locale_text: Tout le monde retenait son souffle. Perturbés par ce spectacle, nous attendions que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prenne la parole.

languages.text: 在场的所有人都屏住了呼吸。眼前的景象让我们感到不安，所有人都在等着舰长大人发话。
languages.original_text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

traits.locale_text: 在场的所有人都屏住了呼吸。眼前的景象让我们感到不安，所有人都在等着舰长大人发话。

languages.text: Todos los presentes contuvimos el aliento... consternados por esa imagen, esperamos a que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tomara la palabra.
languages.original_text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

traits.locale_text: Todos los presentes contuvimos el aliento... consternados por esa imagen, esperamos a que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tomara la palabra.

languages.text: Alle Anwesenden hielten den Atem an. Verstört von diesem Anblick warteten wir darauf, dass der Lord Captain etwas sagte.
languages.original_text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

traits.locale_text: Alle Anwesenden hielten den Atem an. Verstört von diesem Anblick warteten wir darauf, dass der Lord Captain etwas sagte.

languages.text: Olaya şahit olan herkes nefesini tutup Lord Kaptan'ın konuşmasını bekledi.
languages.original_text: All present held their breath — disturbed by this sight, we waited for the Lord Captain to speak.

traits.locale_text: Olaya şahit olan herkes nefesini tutup Lord Kaptan'ın konuşmasını bekledi.
